title: Ukraine's New President Vows Not To Give Up Crimea
teaser: Ukraine's new president, Petro Poroshenko, was inaugurated Saturday. Analyst Olexiy Haran tells NPR's Scott Simon that the Chocolate King, as he's known, hopes to mend ties with Russia.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
